content:
Daaveedaathmaja mariyaame! Ka-nye! Thanvamgee
Ninvrtthaantam varnnippaan nyaa-napraapthan thaan
Daaveedaathmaja mariyaame! Nin-thaathanmaarkkum
Ninne vaazhtthidunnorkkum nin-perkkum bhaagyam.
Daaveedaathmaja mariyaame! Ni-nne aachaaryan
Potti, thaarunye siddhan yau-seppinneki.
Daaveedaathmaja mariyaame! Sthree-rathnam nee thaan
Samsthuthyam thanne kanye! Nin garbham shuddhe!
Daaveedaathmaja mariyaame! Ni-nnude perunnaallil
Vinmanlokarkkaanandam nin-praarththhanayabhayam.
